price: Isipo kuwa wale walio tubu baada ya hayo na wakatengenea; kwani Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mwenye kusamehe na Mwenye kurehemu.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ وَأَصۡلَحُواْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ
footnotes: Lakini wale ambao wamejing'oa na madhambi yao, wakaingia kati ya watu wema, wakayaondoa waliyo yaharibu, basi hakika Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu atawafutia madhambi yao, kwani maghfira na rehema ni miongoni mwa sifa za dhati yake Tukufu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna tābū min baʿdi dhālika wa-aṣlaḥū fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
